name: World War: Idle Clicker
description:
Take the Charge! Civil war have destroyed everything in your fiction country. You are chosen as Army Chief. Head Army, Air-force and Navy. Strengthen your military and restore your country's pride and glory.

Buy and upgrade dozens of military hardware. From ground troops to aircraft carriers. Buy/Sell whatever you can to survive the ongoing wars. Knock the enemies out and be a superpower. Build your very own mighty military!

Lead your country to victory!

FEATURES
● Total 5 armies will fight wars to gain supremacy
● Tap and earn money to unlock military hardware, buy, sell and upgrade existing ones
● Beat opponent’s by owing more hardware than them. It will you more strength and points
● Build and upgrade across all 3 categories: Army, Air-force and Navy
● Establish your powerful Military to defeat your opponents
● Progress through ongoing Wars and become a Superpower
● Devise your own military strategy to outcompete your opponents
● 11 Army Items : Troops, Tanks, Missile Systems etc
● 10 Air-force Items: Drones, Fighter Jets, Attack Helicopters etc
● 8 Navy Items: Assault Boats, Battleships and Aircraft Carriers
● 20 Levels, 20 Wars!

A colorful, beautifully designed, unique war clicker game.

● Do you have what it takes to be an army chief?
● Can you devise strategies and win wars in this challenging game?
● It won't be easy - you have been warned!

Play Now FREE!
